text: Arthur Louis Thurlow (May 5, 1913 â€“ May 27, 2020) is a Canadian politician and judge. He served as a member of the Nova Scotia House of Assembly from 1949 to 1953. He represented the electoral district of Lunenburg County. He was a member of the Nova Scotia Liberal Party. Thurlow was born in Lunenburg, Nova Scotia. He turned 100 in 2013. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian centenarians Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Politicians from Nova Scotia
title: Arthur L. Thurlow
